EmailTemplate.name: HEVT-202307-xSEG-FRM-POST-FORUM.Email #2a (Last chance to share feedback on Foru
EmailTemplate.subject: Last chance to share feedback on Forum
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Attendee}},
It was great to be with you at Forum last month! We’re thankful for our strong community of healthcare changemakers and for the opportunities that bring us together, which we are always seeking to improve.
We want to hear about your Forum experience. If you haven’t already, please fill out this survey <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/RFC7Z38]]> to share your perspective and get a chance to win one of three SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speakers.* *Teladoc Health will give away three speakers, one speaker set to three Forum Attendees who have submitted fully-completed surveys. Surveys must be completed and submitted by August 4th. No more than one prize per person; Teladoc Health employees are not eligible for the promotion.
About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals. All rights reserved. 2 Manhattanville Road, Purchase NY, 10577.
